titles.title: A bill for the relief of Shigeru Yamada.
A bill for the relief of Shigeru Yamada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Shigeru Yamada to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
